returns._0: Whether the address has the `FLASHLOANER_TREASURY_ROLE` or not
Whether the address has the `GOVERNOR_ROLE` or not

isGovernorOrGuardian(address).details: Governance should make sure when adding a governor to also give this governor the guardian role by calling the `addGovernor` function

returns._0: Whether the address has the `GUARDIAN_ROLE` or not

isFlashLoanerTreasury(address).notice: Checks if an address corresponds to a treasury of a stablecoin with a flash loan module initialized on it

isGovernor(address).notice: Checks whether an address is governor of the Angle Protocol or not

isGovernorOrGuardian(address).notice: Checks whether an address is governor or a guardian of the Angle Protocol or not
